document_data.name: Summon Nature's Ally III
document_data.mainbody: '''''Summon nature's ally III''''' was one of the series of ''[[summon nature's ally]]'' spells available to [[druid]] and [[ranger]] spellcasters.
document_data.Effects: This spell functioned just like all ''summon nature's ally'' spells, which in turn resembled the ''[[summon monster]]'' spells. It could summon a single [[ape]], [[dire weasel]], [[dire wolf]], [[giant eagle]], [[lion]], [[giant owl]], [[satyr]], large [[shark]], [[constrictor snake]], large [[viper]], or [[thoqqua]]. It could also be used to summon a larger number of monsters from a lower level of a spell in the series.
document_data.Components: The spell required a [[divine focus]] and both [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s.
